feed.title: John Salon | Ferndale, Michigan
feed.subtitle: Web home for Ferndale, Michigan based hairdresser John Niebauer currently based out of Fern and Dale's hair salon. John specializes in weddings, colorings, up-dos and more.

entry.title: Sample Post
entry.content:
title: sample post date: 2018-05-19 08:00:00 description: this is a sample post share-image: max-wirt.jpg – markdown content goes here

share-image variable is for metadata for facebook and twitter sharing. It is the image that gets shown for the url of the page when shared on facebook or twitter.

only need subpath of /assets/img/
